Sentencas: A Cr-poisoning of SOFC cathode was studied using half-cells with alloy separators of various Cr-content.
Titulo: Relationship between electrochemical properties of SOFC cathode and composition of oxide layer formed on metallic interconnects

Sentencas: The surfaces of the oxide layer formed on the alloys were observed using energy dispersion X-ray analysis, and the precipitation of Cr at the interface between YSZ electrolyte and the cathode was studied using electron probe micro analysis.
Titulo: Relationship between electrochemical properties of SOFC cathode and composition of oxide layer formed on metallic interconnects

Sentencas: All the Cr-containing alloys were found to promote cathode degradation.
Titulo: Relationship between electrochemical properties of SOFC cathode and composition of oxide layer formed on metallic interconnects

Sentencas: However, the time dependencies of overvoltage in half-cell tests were different from one another in three kinds of alloy materials.
Titulo: Relationship between electrochemical properties of SOFC cathode and composition of oxide layer formed on metallic interconnects

Sentencas: We found that the reason of the difference was in relation to the Cr2O3 and the MnCr2O4 in the oxide layer formed on the alloy surface.
Titulo: Relationship between electrochemical properties of SOFC cathode and composition of oxide layer formed on metallic interconnects

Sentencas: Tests of single-cell stacks were also performed with these alloy separators.
Titulo: Relationship between electrochemical properties of SOFC cathode and composition of oxide layer formed on metallic interconnects

Sentencas: The degradation of stack voltage was large for all the stacks, and that was consistent with the half-cell tests.
Titulo: Relationship between electrochemical properties of SOFC cathode and composition of oxide layer formed on metallic interconnects

Sentencas: The reason for the large degradation was found to be a formation of SrCrO4, which was presumably synthesized by the reaction of Cr2O3 in the oxide layer on the alloy and Sr diffused from the cathode.
Titulo: Relationship between electrochemical properties of SOFC cathode and composition of oxide layer formed on metallic interconnects

Sentencas: Therefore, it is necessary to develop a component in which the alloy does not contact the cathode directly.
Titulo: Relationship between electrochemical properties of SOFC cathode and composition of oxide layer formed on metallic interconnects
